carousel_banner.text:
Know where you want to be.
 Else is secondary.

Kow where you want to be.
 Else is secondary.

heading: Traces of the ancient maritime glory with touches of modern-day comfort
text:
The MAJ Oceanic is a traditional hand-crafted two-masted Phinisi yacht with 7 resort-standard suites outfitted with modern design and technology.

 Learn, feel, understand, taste, and touch new things while awakening your inner explorer. Get up close with the world's largest lizard species. Huddle together along the railings to spot nature's great displays. Enjoy seafood the Jack Sparrow way. Or practice yoga to the sound of waves

. If to travel is to live, then this might be the life you never knew existed.

carousel_card.caption: The Vessel
carousel_card.heading: Craftmanship lives on
carousel_card.text: Sailing on a modern-take of the Phinisi is the best way to enjoy the beauty of the Indonesian archipelago. An icon of Indonesia's seafaring tradition, the Phinisi boat-building is recognized by UNESCO as a Masterpiece of Oral and Intangible Heritage of Humanity. 1

card_text_image_small.heading: Raja Ampat
card_text_image_small.text: The lair of the world-famous Komodo dragons. Swim in pristine lakes and waterfalls, dive at one of the 50 spectacular dive sites, go kayaking among craggy coasts and mangrove shores, explore mysterious caves and be warmly welcomed by the islandâ€™s people in their rituals, dances and daily life.

card_text_image_small.heading: Flores Sea
card_text_image_small.text: Find wonders above and beyond waters, as well as on land and amidst the thick jungles in an archipelago comprising over 1,500 small islands, cays, and shoals surrounding the four main islands of Waigeo, Batanta, Salawati, and Misool.
